definitions.definition: A messenger , especially one bringing important news .
examples: The herald blew his trumpet and shouted that the King was dead.

definitions.definition: A harbinger , giving signs of things to come.
( heraldry ) An official whose speciality is heraldry , especially one between the ranks of pursuivant and king-of-arms
examples: Rouge Dragon is a herald at the College of Arms.

definitions.definition: ( entomology ) A moth of the species Scoliopteryx libatrix .
( advertising ) A handbill consisting of an advertisement .

main_definition: A messenger , especially one bringing important news .
secondary_definitions: A harbinger , giving signs of things to come.
( heraldry ) An official whose speciality is heraldry , especially one between the ranks of pursuivant and king-of-arms
( entomology ) A moth of the species Scoliopteryx libatrix .
( advertising ) A handbill consisting of an advertisement .

definitions.definition: Alternative form of hareld ( “ long-tailed duck ” ) .

main_definition: Alternative form of hareld ( “ long-tailed duck ” ) .
